This action cannot be undone. Success message: Shift schedule has been deleted. Employee metrics updated back to 0 hrs - 0 shifts.

workflow_integration.notes: Workflow triggers are available under Bayzat Attendance app. All three core shift events (create, update, delete) can trigger workflows, enabling automation such as notifications, integrations, or dependent actions.

approval_flow.notes: Shift Change Request has a dedicated approval flow configuration. Default flow routes to Super Admin. Advanced conditional flows can be added based on criteria. This enables manager approval workflows when employees request shift changes.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: Cannot add split shift if one shift already exists
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: The UI doesn't provide a clear mechanism to add a second shift to a day that already has one scheduled
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Attempted to click on calendar cell with existing shift to add second shift. Cell click was intercepted by existing shift card. No visible UI path to add second shift when one exists.

summary: Split Shifts feature validation completed successfully. All CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) passed validation. Workflow integration confirmed with 3 triggers available in Bayzat Attendance app (shift created, updated, deleted). Approval flow confirmed with dedicated Shift Change Request tab supporting multi-step approvals. Primary limitation OS-299 validated: UI does not provide clear path to add second shift when one already exists on a day. Feature is functional for shift scheduling with calendar interface, work center filters, and employee-based shift assignment. Successfully created, modified, and deleted test shifts for validation purposes.
